name: Shooting Star Of The Galaxy
description:
This is 2D Shooting game.

There are 3 levels. You will meet stronger enemies.

In the last stage you should defeat the Boss to win!

You can also play Endless mode. To survive, get lives(♥) and defeat enemies as many as you can!

#Movement:

     w

a        d

     s

#Shooting:

left click,

and you can change the direction of the player moving mouse.

#Modifications:

- enemies(bigger, stronger, Boss)

- Boss Stage

- You can see the number of Lives

- 2 modes(level1~3, endless mode)

Credits

Created by Choi yerin
